item.title: Roblox: Anchored Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Anchored Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Anchored
  • How to Get More Anchored Codes

Anchored is an exciting cooperative Roblox game with horror elements. It offers a lot of excitement thanks to its interesting gameplay, mounting tension, and a variety of game situations. Your goal is to get to the surface with other players, overcoming floor after floor, but evil robots guard them, so only the strongest will make it out.

One of the cool features of the game is the characters, each with different characteristics and abilities. Abilities can completely change the course of the game, so it's worth buying a character as soon as possible. To do this, you'll have to earn some game currency, but luckily, you can get some for free if you redeem Anchored codes from our guide.

Updated October 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Anchored offers a couple of active codes that grant you Lumens to enhance your gameplay experience. These rewards can help you progress faster and unlock more features. Keep an eye out for future updates, as new codes are often released during special milestones.

All Anchored Codes

Working Anchored Codes

  • 1BVISITS - Redeem this code to get Lumens. (NEW)
  • 0excl - Redeem this code to get Lumens.

Expired Anchored Codes

  • NIGHT
  • puffy
  • 10K
  • A100K
  • NIGHTLAUNCH
  • DOUBLESILLY

In Anchored , you can get Lumens if you redeem codes. This is the main currency in this Roblox game, and you can spend it to buy a stronger character. This will increase your chances of winning, as the starting characters are quite weak.

How to Redeem Codes in Anchored

In Roblox , codes can be easily redeemed. This option is usually found in the menu or elsewhere in the game interface. However, sometimes you need to go to a specific location to activate the code. For example, in Anchored , you need to visit Scruff's Shop to buy something or redeem codes. This can be confusing for many players, so we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Anchored .

  • Launch Roblox and open Anchored .
  • In the lobby, you need to open Scruff's Shop. To do this, go to the window with the anchor image.
  • Then click the Codes button.
  • Paste the code from the list of working codes into the white text field and click the green Redeem button.

Remember that codes can quickly expire, so redeem them as soon as possible to get all the rewards.

How to Get More Anchored Codes

One of the best ways to find working Roblox codes is to use guides like this one. We update it regularly, so you can be among the first to use the codes and receive rewards. If you are more interested in official sources of information from Anchored developers, we recommend visiting the following pages:

  • Anchored Roblox game page
  • Anchored Roblox group
  • Anchored Discord server
  • Anchored X page
  • Anchored YouTube channel
Roblox
443
8.8 /10
Released
September 1, 2006

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
Teen / Diverse Content: Discretion Advised, In-Game Purchases (Includes Random Items), Users Interact
Developer(s)
Roblox Corporation
Publisher(s)
Roblox Corporation
Platform(s)
PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PC, Android, iOS, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest Pro

item.title: Summoners War Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Summoners War Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Summoners War
  • How to Get More Summoners War Codes

Summoners War is an epic adventure where you need to build the best set of characters and defeat many monsters that will stand in your way. You can choose unique tactics for each battle and get valuable rewards. If you like freebies, we have a list of codes for Summoners War that will speed up your progress.

Updated October 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are no active codes available for Summoners War right now. New codes are usually added during events or special updates. Check back soon to see if any new rewards become available.

All Summoners War Codes

How to Redeem Codes in Summoners War

There are two ways to redeem codes in Summoners War . The first allows you to do it in the game itself. As you progress through the game, this feature will be unlocked for you eventually. The second way is to do this via the website. If you don't know how to redeem codes in Summoners War , follow the guide below:

First Method

  • Launch Summoners War .
  • Once in the game, go to the Event tab. It is on the right side of the screen under resources and currency.
  • Next, select the Event tab.
  • Among the offered options, select the Enter Your Promo Code link.
  • Redeem the code.
  • Enjoy.

Second Method

  • Open your browser.
  • Visit the Summoners War Coupon Exchange website.
  • Select your Game Server.
  • Next, enter your Hive ID.
  • Now, insert the code you want to use.
  • Launch Summoners War .
  • Enjoy your reward.

How to Get More Summoners War Codes

If you want to get more codes for Summoners War , we recommend that you subscribe to the official social networks of the developers. They often add new codes for holidays or events and post them on their pages. Here are some of them:

  • Instagram
  • Twitter (X)
  • Facebook

Summoners War is available on PC, Android, and iOS.

item.title: Roblox: Type Soul Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Jump Links

  • All Type Soul Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Type Soul
  • How to Play Type Soul
  • The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Type Soul
  • About the Type Soul Developers

Type Soul is a Roblox game set in the world of Bleach , where players must embark upon an incredible journey. The game offers a challenging experience where fans choose their path as Quincy, Hollow, or the popular choice, a Soul Reaper. By completing quests, missions, and PvP battles, players unlock powerful abilities such as Shikai and explore the various divisions of Soul Society.

The game combines strategy, character progression, and intense gameplay to deliver an engaging experience. Below, Roblox players will find all of the latest codes for Type Soul that offer different in-game rewards. So let's stop talking and dive right into the codes.

Updated October 8, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Type Soul has several new codes available that grant various in-game rewards. These fresh additions can help you progress faster and experiment with different upgrades or rerolls. Be sure to use them soon and keep an eye out for more updates and future code drops.

How to Redeem Codes for Type Soul

If players want to redeem the aforementioned codes, the process is quite straightforward. Just like in most other Roblox games, everything is done very simply and just requires a few buttons. But if fans still need help with the redemption, they can refer to the step-by-step instructions below:

  • First, it is necessary to launch Type Soul .
  • After that, press Play.
  • If the user is playing for the first time, then they will need to choose a gender and come up with a name.
  • After the player appears in the game, they should find and click or tap on the red button in the form of a gift; it is located on the top left but is semi-transparent, so it can be difficult to see.
  • When the button is pressed, a menu will appear with the Enter Code Here field in which fans must enter the code.
  • To redeem the code, just press Enter.

Also, keep in mind that each code can be redeemed only once per account.

How to Play Type Soul

At first glance, Type Soul is a rather complicated anime game. However, if players want to take their first steps and don't know where to start, this is no longer a problem. As a Lost Soul, players can choose one of three races in the game: Hollow, Quincy, or Soul Reaper. Below they will find some simple steps to take at the beginning of the game to successfully integrate into it:

Becoming a Hollow

To become a Hollow, press Ctrl K. But if the players don't want to be Hollow, then don't use this button at all.

Becoming a Quincy

  • As a Lost Soul, look for the Wanda gate located at coordinates xx:10 and xx:40. It has a blue side on the right and a white side on the left.
  • The gate is open for 10 minutes at specific times.
  • Enter the gate and follow the path to find a statue NPC that asks if players worship the king.
  • Interact with this NPC to become a Quincy.

Becoming a Soul Reaper

Currently, there are two ways to become a Soul Reaper: purification and a Shinigami Quest.

  • Players can ask a Soul Reaper player to purify them.
  • Keep an eye out for the Shinigami Quest, which may offer an alternative path to becoming a Soul Reaper.

The Best Roblox Anime Games Like Type Soul

Players looking for a new gaming experience need to look any further. Below they will find the 5 best games similar to Type Soul . Every anime fan will be able to find something for themselves:

  • Anime Adventures
  • Anime Souls Simulator
  • Anime Power Tycoon
  • Project Mugetsu
  • Titan Warfare

About the Type Soul Developers

Type Soul was created by a good team of developers. Here are their nicknames:

  • K1LLUAA
  • vvithdraw
  • Khaotxc
  • 4Data
  • drakoooos
  • cartier361

So far, this is the only game they have made together. Their Roblox group has very few subscribers and information, although the game itself has already collected more than one hundred thousand likes and one hundred and fifty million visits.
